summary: A half-American Indian and half-white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.
cast: Steve McQueen|Karl Malden|Brian Keith|Arthur Kennedy|Suzanne Pleshette|Raf Vallone|Janet Margolin|Pat Hingle|Howard Da Silva|Martin Landau|Paul Fix|Gene Evans|Josephine Hutchinson|John Doucette|Val Avery|Sheldon Allman|Lyle Bettger|Bert Freed|David McLean|Steve Mitchell|Merritt Bohn|Sandy Kenyon|Ric Roman|John Lawrence|Stanley Adams|George Mitchell|John Litel|Ted de Corsia|Loni Anderson|Jan Arvan|Carmen Austin|Baynes Barron|Isabel Boniface|Paul Bradley|Thordis Brandt|Joe Budd|Forest Burns|Frank Christi|Iron Eyes Cody|Bud Cokes|Carol Daniels|Walt Davis|Jerry Gatlin|Chuck Hayward|Bob Hoy|Loren Janes|Maureen Janzen|Dal Jenkins|L.Q. Jones|Dave Kashner|Patty Kelly|Kenner G. Kemp|Jack Lilley|Strother Martin|Joanna Moore|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Joyce Nizzari|Francine Pyne|Mike Ragan|Chuck Roberson|Victor Romito|Clark Ross|Jeffrey Sayre|Roy N. Sickner|Milan Smith|Sarita Vara|Ralph Volkie|Edy Williams|Henry Wills|Dick Winslow|Chief Yowlachie
title: Nevada Smith
